newsitem.title: EU: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - MARCH 18-19 (PAGE 2/2).
newsitem.headline: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - MARCH 18-19 (PAGE 2/2).

text.p: 2. Shipments of certain types of waste to certain non-OECD countries (T04454) (97/018) (T04454) CNS95029 COM(94)0678 C4-0048/97 + JURI Avis F ENVI Fond R VIRGIN Ivar. (PPE) (PE221.723 )
Referred to Parliament on 19 February 1997 - due to be adopted in committee on 16 April; June I part-session
3. Convention on the service and notification of judicial acts (T04795) (97/019) (T04795) CNS97901 5317/97 C4-0062/97 + JURI Avis F LIBE Fond R NASSAUER Hartmut. (PPE) (PE220.933/AM-)
Referred to Parliament on 19 February 1997 - due to be adopted in committee on 19 March; APRIL II part-session
4. Common rules for imports of certain textile products from third countries (T05378) (97/011) (T05378) ACC97020 COM(96)0703 + JURI Avis F RELA Fond R MONIZ Fernando. (PSE)

5. 26th report on competition policy (1996) report being prepared at the Commission A N N E X II ===] Motion for a resolution (Rule 45) referred to the committee as committee re sponsible during the part-session from 11 to 15 November 1996 - Decision on procedure (Rule 45(2) of the Rules of Procedure): - combine the motion for a resolution with other motions for resolutions or repo rts - deliver an opinion, possibly in letter form - draw up a report, in which case the committee has to obtain the approval of th e Conference of Presidents
22. Creation of an EU fisheries insurance consortium. (B4-1236/96) ( (96/129) ).
